Headline: #48 South Damen and #94 South California Temporary Reroute near Damen/74th
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen and 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/74th, due to street blockage near Damen/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#48 South Damen and #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/74th, due to street blockage near Damen/74th.

#48 South Damen buses will operate via Damen, 71st, Ashland, 74th, Damen and over regular route.

#94 South California buses will operate via Damen, 71st, Ashland, 74th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Northbound  Reroute near Jeffery/91st
ShortDescription: Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temp rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th: due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
